content.raw:
This message doesn't seem to match what's happening. Should it say that a `<reflectance_map>` is required?

Also, since `gzerr` will already print the file name and line, I think the `[ReflectancePlugin]` bits can be removed.
content.html:
This message doesn't seem to match what's happening. Should it say that a <reflectance_map> is required?

Also, since gzerr will already print the file name and line, I think the [ReflectancePlugin] bits can be removed.

content.raw: Could you document here what this plugin does and how it should be used?
content.html: Could you document here what this plugin does and how it should be used?

update.description:
Refletance must be an image.

To include the reflectance:

```
<link>
...
  <visual name="visual">
    ...
      <plugin filename="libReflectancePlugin.so" name="reflectance_plugin">
        <reflectance_map>Gazebo/Blue</reflectance_map>
      </plugin>
      ...
   </visual>
...
</link>
```

‌

‌

content.raw:
The segfault is happening when \```gazebo::shutdown();` in Server.cc`` is called.

`gazebo::shutdown();`  → [Server.cc](https://bitbucket.org/ahcorde/gazebo/src/4ad881003922d741d5d46355e732333f716837cb/gazebo/Server.cc#lines-598)

`gazebo::sensors::fini();`  →  [gazebo.cc](https://bitbucket.org/ahcorde/gazebo/src/4ad881003922d741d5d46355e732333f716837cb/gazebo/gazebo.cc#lines-136)

`rendering::fini(); `→ [SensorIface.cc](https://bitbucket.org/ahcorde/gazebo/src/4ad881003922d741d5d46355e732333f716837cb/gazebo/sensors/SensorsIface.cc#lines-71)

`rendering::RenderEngine::Instance()->Fini();` → [RenderingIface.cc](https://bitbucket.org/ahcorde/gazebo/src/4ad881003922d741d5d46355e732333f716837cb/gazebo/rendering/RenderingIface.cc#lines-66)

`delete this->dataPtr->root;`  →  [RenderEngine.cc](https://bitbucket.org/ahcorde/gazebo/src/4ad881003922d741d5d46355e732333f716837cb/gazebo/rendering/RenderEngine.cc#lines-361)

‌
content.html:
The segfault is happening when `gazebo::shutdown();` in Server.cc is called.

gazebo::shutdown(); → Server.cc

gazebo::sensors::fini(); → gazebo.cc

rendering::fini();→ SensorIface.cc

rendering::RenderEngine::Instance()->Fini(); → RenderingIface.cc

delete this->dataPtr->root; → RenderEngine.cc

‌

content.raw: [New build](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia/112/) with latest changes - the `UNIT_DepthCameraSensor_TEST` crashed with segfault.
content.html: New build with latest changes - the UNIT_DepthCameraSensor_TEST crashed with segfault.

content.raw: can you move the definition of this class to the .cc file? You can just foward delcare the class here. This makes sure the private implementation does not get installed / exposed to the user.
